title.narrative: Combating Trafficking in Persons in Micronesia through Establishment of Protection Frameworks for Victims of Trafficking

description.narrative: IOM is enhancing victim protection, conducting multi-disciplinary and multi-sectoral trainings on victim-centered investigations and prosecutions of trafficking cases, and supporting the establishment and institutionalization of a national referral mechanism in the Federated States of Micronesia, the Republic of the Marshall Islands, and the Republic of Palau. IOM is facilitating the implementation of comprehensive protection frameworks, with a focus on: (1) awareness raising of trafficking in persons; (2) boosting understanding and capacity of law enforcement on proactive victim identification within vulnerable populations and the need for victim-centered protection; and (3) the establishment of national referral mechanisms for the protection of victims of trafficking through strong partnerships with national and state authorities.

person-name.narrative: Jenee Sharon; Wes Aviles; Ryan Boles

transaction.usg:treasury-account: International Narcotics Control and Law Enforcement
International Narcotics Control and Law Enforcement

title.narrative: Resilience and Adaptation Fellowship for Rising Leaders Program

description.narrative: The Resilience and Adaptation Fellowship for Rising Leaders Program will offer rising leaders the opportunity to gain expertise in a range of disciplines that strengthen climate resilience, including natural resource economics and management, blue economies, resilient food

title.narrative: ADAPT Pacific

description.narrative: To strengthen capacity of PSIDS and regional partners in order to address the negative impacts of climate change through access to climate finance. Project objectives include: (1) accelerating access to financial resources for climate change adaptation investment projects; (2) strengthening human and institutional capacity to prepare quality climate change adaptation investment proposals; and (3) strengthening and sustaining a regional knowledge platform to share and replicate best practices
